wikipedia_page.main: William "Silver Billy" Beldham (5 February 1766 – 20 February 1862) was an English professional cricketer who played between the 1780s and 1810s. He is generally acknowledged as one of the greatest batsmen of the sport's underarm era. In 1997, he was selected by John Woodcock of The Times as one of his 100 Greatest Cricketers of All Time.
